comments: Number of rows in the triangle (for proper formatting do not exceed 13)
Allocating row variable (this is done here to avoid that it is unallocated when exiting the loop
Defining the triangle variable as an array of undefined arrays
initializing the first element of the triangle
Allocating the inner array in the current row
Padding the current console line to create prettier formatted output
Looping through every collumn in the current row
printing the content of the current element
adding the value of the current element to the below row at the same collumn location
adding the value of the current element to the below row at the next collumn location

Printing the last row
            ** This is done seperately to avoid adding more rows to the triangle
Looping through every collumn in the last row
printing the content of the current element
wait for user input to halt program
